input_args.text: 'Next Prev Swipe left/right So apparently “Sausage FM” where they play the sound of sizzling sausages all day is now a thing \n@Hwallop over on Twitter writes, “News in brief in @thetimes. I feel this is worthy of a 1500-word feature. Or a Pinter play.” \nThere’s a clip of “Sausage FM – Less Talk, More Pork” over on Soundcloud .'
